posts.post_content:
I am selling a T206 Barbeau with a BL350 back. The card is centered to the bottom, but still presents like a VG/VG-EX card. To the best of my knowledge this is the only Barbeau BL350 possibly in existence since both the SGC and PSA pop reports list 0 examples for this combination.

I am asking (sold) for this card, but I'm open to reasonable offers. Payment by Paypal only.

Please contact me with any questions.

[url]mmw2161@aol.com[/url]

Thanks for your consideration.

Jerry
